response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself. Considering its true worth and the unique benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $1,300,000. I am confident this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for me and an attractive deal for you. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1300000}
